Currency summary

Source: R/others.R
currency_summary.Rd

Contains information available via the Summary tab in Yahoo Finance.

Usage

currency_summary(from = "USD", to = "INR")

Arguments

from

Currency to convert from.

to

Currency to convert to.

Value

A list.

Examples

# \donttest{
currency_summary('GBP', 'USD')
#> $language
#> [1] "en-US"
#> 
#> $region
#> [1] "US"
#> 
#> $quoteType
#> [1] "CURRENCY"
#>

#>

#>

#>
